casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Maechel S. PATTERSON 597P01-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019

Maechel Shawn Patterson, For Patterson, Maechel Shawn

Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

*427The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of February 2019 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
